description: Try our easy to follow Nourish Bowl With Edamame, Salmon & Perfect Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Nourish Bowl With Edamame, Salmon & Perfect Pesto
name: Nourish Bowl With Edamame, Salmon & Perfect Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat rice according to packet instructions. Divide between serving bowls. Top with edamame, black beans, salmon, cabbage, avocado and egg. Serve with a dollop of pesto and season with pepper.
